creator: CREDITS.COM CORP.
descriptionHtml:
Credits Wallet is the official mobile wallet app of the Credits blockchain platform. It allows you to manage and store your Credits blockchain-based crypto in a secure cryptocurrency app. We designed the Credits mobile wallet to include the best characteristics of blockchain wallets to give you safe and easy to use cryptocurrency storage with with high-level security.

High Security
Credits Wallet is a free application which increases the safety of your crypto funds. The Credits team states with confidence that your funds are kept in a safe place. The functionality of the application is implemented strictly according to the latest safety standards.

Instant Transfers
Credits Wallet leverages the has a high-performance of the Credits Platform to ensure lightning fast transactions. The minimum time to process a transaction is around 0.01 sec which allows you to make payments without limits. There’s no need to wait minutes or hours for your transactions to process. Take back the time spent using other blockchains; your time is the most important resource that you have.

About Credits Mobile Wallet
Credits Wallet provides you with secure and simple methods to send, receive and store digital assets issued on Credits blockchain.

About Credits
Credits is a platform based on blockchain technology and smart contracts for the development and execution of decentralized applications. It serves as a mediator between the technology and the business. The high speed transactions, decentralization, scalability, and low fees provided by Credits blockchain are transforming traditional business models by eliminating uncertainty.
descriptionShort: Store your crypto in a secure.

descriptionShort: Store your crypto in a secure.
title: Credits

creator: CREDITS.COM CORP.
descriptionHtml:
We Take The Hassle, High Costs And Delays Out Of The Payment Industry. One single application for fiat and cryptocurrency payments. Easy access to worldwide transfers.

High Speed Transactions
It only takes a blink of an eye to pay; by email, phone number, or your Credits wallet address.

Features:
- Create a wallet
- Safely Store your CS and Tokens
- Send and receive CS Instantly
- CS Transfers by email and phone number
- Purchase CS

Benefits:
- Zero transaction fees
- Fast and secured transfers
- 24/7 customer support

Easy Access
Just enter your phone number and start

Support:
We’re here to help! Connect with our customer support team 24/7

descriptionShort: Credits Money and Cryptocurrency Payments
title: Credits

creator: CS Solutions Technology Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Designed & Developed by Experts.
Credits is a Crypto Wallet where you can store, receive, buy and send your crypto. We have made the purchase of cryptocurrency easier than whoever. Buy and sell crypto by card and bank transfer with low fees.

Supported Assets.
With our mobile app, you can buy cryptocurrencies such as: ETH (Ethereum), BTC (Bitcoin), BNB (Binance Coin), USDT, USDC, DAI and 30+ other assets.

What You Can Find In Our Crypto Wallet:
- A simple form for depositing, withdrawing and exchanging crypto & fiat assets.
- Purchase of cryptocurrencies via a card or bank transfer.
- A lot of crypto assets are available for trading as well as fiat.
- Low fees for buying or exchanging cryptocurrencies.
- Fast transfers with a phone number, without any complex crypto wallets addresses.
- No fees for cryptocurrency transfers to your friends' wallets who use our app.
- History and transaction receipts.
- Account currency selection.
- Unlimited number of linked cards for depositing and withdrawing your funds.
- Access 24/7 live chat customer support with multilingual tech support.
- Sign in with fingerprint or face recognition.
- A variety of templates for frequent operations.
- Setting up convenient notifications. No need in receiving SMS messages? Relax, just turn them off.
- Security of your wealth.

Extra Information & Feedback
Visit our website Credits.com to get more information and don’t hesitate to send us a message if you have any questions. The Credits support service team is always ready to assist you. Help us make our crypto wallet app better! We’d be happy to hear your feedback!
Our Privacy Policy
You can read the legal privacy policy of Credits at https://credits.com/privacy-policy.html

descriptionShort: A simple and user-friendly Сrypto Wallet for buying & selling cryptocurrencies.
title: Credits - Crypto wallet

creator: CS Solutions Technology Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Credits.com is the easy way to send, spend, save, and invest your money*.
Credits.com for SAFE, FAST, and FREE mobile and digital banking**.

SAFE: Credits.com is a licensed fully compliant European banking, payment and cryptocurrency service.

FAST: Sign up and make your first payment in minutes. Instantly send and receive money from friends. Transfer money from Credits App to an external bank account instantly instead of waiting days.

FAST: All transactions in Credits are done online from the mobile application or Web version of the site. Credits offers different options for transferring funds or cryptocurrencies worldwide and in many Cards, bank transfers, SEPA, SWIFT, Paypal, or crypto transfers. All work instantly instead of waiting days in traditional banks.

FREE TRANSFERS: Sign up and make your first payment in minutes. Instantly send and receive money from friends. Transfer between Credits users in Credits App are free. Transfers from Credits App to an external bank account are executed instantly instead of waiting days in traditional banks.

FREE: Mobile applications are free for the User. You can open a current account in minutes completely free of charge. You don't have to pay a monthly subscription.

MONEY: Open a European EUR SEPA account online from minutes. Banking services are provided by Monetley, operating under the laws of England and Wales, registered in the FCA as Electronic Money Institution (EMI) (FCA Reference number: 900921).

PAYMENT ACCOUNTS: You can use Credits to transfer and receive funds for work, friends or relatives. Send and Receive money from anybody in the world.

SEND AND RECEIVE MONEY AND CRYPTO INSTANTLY
Deposit and Receive money for free from friends and family instantly with only a few taps. There are many convenient options for top ups and withdrawals.
Send and receive money at minimum cost.

CRYPTO: Invest in cryptocurrency from just $1. Get access to 40+ cryptocurrencies. Get in Credits.com your individual crypto account and use Public Key for sending and receiving cryptocurrency around the world.

BUY, SELL, SEND, AND RECEIVE CRYPTOCURRENCY
Credits is the easy way to buy, sell, send, gift, and receive bitcoin (BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC and other 40+ cryptocurrency) — get started instantly with as little as $1.
You can also use set up buys of bitcoin, withdraw it to a different cryptocurrency wallet — or send it to friends and family.

HERE'S HOW IT WORKS
Download and sign up for Credits.com in a matter of minutes.

ONLINE and REMOTELY
FREE SIGN UP: The signup process is simple, fast and free for having a Credits account, so that you can start using Credits right away.

GET A VISA DEBIT CARD
Order your Credits Card directly on the Credits App. You'll be able to instantly make purchases using your virtual card. We'll also mail you your physical Credits Card so you can swipe, dip, or tap at any merchant (debit cards will be available in Q1 2022).

TOP UP & WITHDRAWAL ACCOUNT:
Use one of the widest options for replenishing your Credits account in the following way:
- VISA or Mastercard cards for instant top-ups
- SEPA & SWIFT bank transfer for fast EUR transfers
- Cryptocurrency: more than 40+ supported currencies
- PayPal & Skrill: coming soon.

*Credits is a financial services platform, not a bank. Current accounts and debit cards provided and issued by Credits’ banking partners. All operations are licensed and performed in accordance with the laws of the country that issued the license.
- Banking services provided by Monetley, operating under the laws of England and Wales, registered in the FCA as Electronic Money Institution (EMI) (FCA Reference number: 900921).
- Services relating to crypto-assets are provided by UAB New Software Solutions, registration number is 306045667 and address is Žalgirio g. 90, 6th floor, Vilnius, Lithuania.
descriptionShort: IBAN. Banking. Payments. Cards. Crypto. Investing.
title: Credits.com - Digital Banking

ONLINE and REMOTELY

TOP UP & WITHDRAWAL ACCOUNT:

descriptionHtml:
Credits.com is the easy way to send, spend, save, and invest your money*.
Credits.com for SAFE, FAST, and FREE mobile and digital payments**.

SAFE: Credits.com is a licensed fully compliant European payment and cryptocurrency service.

FAST: Sign up and make your first payment in minutes. Instantly send and receive money from friends. Transfer money from Credits App to an external IBAN account instantly instead of waiting days in traditional banks.

FREE TRANSFERS: Sign up and make your first payment in minutes. Instantly send and receive money from friends. Transfer between Credits users in Credits App are free. Transfers from Credits App to an external IBAN account are executed instantly instead of waiting days in traditional banks.

FREE: Mobile applications are free for the User. You can open a current account in minutes completely free of charge. You don't have to pay a monthly subscription.

MONEY: Open a European EUR SEPA IBAN account online from minutes. Payment services are provided by Monetley, operating under the laws of England and Wales, registered in the FCA as Electronic Money Institution (EMI) (FCA Reference number: 900921).

PAYMENT ACCOUNTS: You can use Credits to transfer and receive funds for work, friends or relatives. Send and Receive money from anybody in the world.

SEND AND RECEIVE MONEY AND CRYPTO INSTANTLY
Deposit and Receive money for free from friends and family instantly with only a few taps. There are many convenient options for top ups and withdrawals.
Send and receive money at minimum cost.

CRYPTO: Invest in cryptocurrency from just $1. Get access to 40+ cryptocurrencies. Get in Credits.com your individual crypto account and use Public Key for sending and receiving cryptocurrency around the world.

BUY, SELL, SEND, AND RECEIVE CRYPTOCURRENCY
Credits is the easy way to buy, sell, send, gift, and receive bitcoin (BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC and other 40+ cryptocurrency) — get started instantly with as little as $1.
You can also use set up buys of bitcoin, withdraw it to a different cryptocurrency wallet — or send it to friends and family.

HERE'S HOW IT WORKS
Download and sign up for Credits.com in a matter of minutes.

ONLINE and REMOTELY
FREE SIGN UP: The signup process is simple, fast and free for having a Credits account, so that you can start using Credits right away.

GET A VISA DEBIT CARD
Order your Credits Card directly on the Credits App. You'll be able to instantly make purchases using your virtual card. We'll also mail you your physical Credits Card so you can swipe, dip, or tap at any merchant (debit cards will be available in Q2 2023).

TOP UP & WITHDRAWAL ACCOUNT:
Use one of the widest options for replenishing your Credits account in the following way:
- VISA or Mastercard cards for instant top-ups
- SEPA & SWIFT transfers for fast EUR transfers
- Cryptocurrency: more than 40+ supported currencies
- PayPal & Skrill: coming soon.

*Credits is a financial services platform, not a bank. Current accounts and debit cards provided and issued by Credits’ partner(s). All operations are licensed and performed in accordance with the laws of the country that issued the license.
- Payment services provided by Monetley, operating under the laws of England and Wales, registered in the FCA as Electronic Money Institution (EMI) (FCA Reference number: 900921).
- Services relating to crypto-assets are provided by UAB New Software Solutions, registration number is 306045667 and address is Žalgirio g. 90, 6th floor, Vilnius, Lithuania.
